item.title: 最新消息：克里斯托弗-诺兰（Christopher Nolan）凭借《奥本海默电影》（@OppenheimerFilm）荣获@奥斯卡导演奖。#奥斯卡奖 #奥本海默
item.description:
JUST IN: Christopher Nolan wins @TheAcademy Award for Directing for @OppenheimerFilm. #Oscars #Oppenheimerhttps://t.co/hNNLxVB1a7 pic.twitter.com/v7K0vjshAG

— ABC News (@ABC) March 11, 2024

item.title: 西里安-墨菲（Cillian Murphy）凭借《奥本海默》获得奥斯卡最佳男主角奖。这是他第一次获得奥斯卡奖，也是第一次获得提名。#Oscars#Oscars2024
item.description:
Cillian Murphy accepts the Oscar for Best Actor for “Oppenheimer.” It's his first Oscar win and first nomination.#Oscars#Oscars2024https://t.co/X7unxQW0XY pic.twitter.com/DjRn9ahzyF

— ABC News (@ABC) March 11, 2024

item.title: 爆炸：@奥本海默电影中的西里安-墨菲获得@奥斯卡男主角奖。#奥斯卡 #奥本海默
item.description:
BREAKING: @TheAcademy Award for Actor in a Leading Role goes to Cillian Murphy in @OppenheimerFilm. #Oscars #Oppenheimerhttps://t.co/hNNLxVB1a7 pic.twitter.com/yDgt5uwKcs

— ABC News (@ABC) March 11, 2024

item.title: Billie Eilish 和 Finneas O'Connell 第二次获得奥斯卡最佳原创歌曲奖。
item.description:
Billie Eilish and Finneas O'Connell have won their second Oscar for Best Original Song. https://t.co/IidjL16Nrk

item.description:

item.title: 瑞恩-高斯林（Ryan Gosling）和马克-朗森（Mark Ronson）登上奥斯卡颁奖典礼的舞台，史诗般地演唱了《芭比娃娃》中的 "I'm Just Ken"。
item.description:
Ryan Gosling and Mark Ronson took to the Oscars stage to deliver an epic performance of "I'm Just Ken" from "Barbie." https://t.co/tlhQrY5WX4

item.title: Billie Eilish 和 Finneas O'Connell 凭借《芭比娃娃》中的 "What Was I Made For? "获得奥斯卡最佳原创歌曲奖。#Oscars#Oscars2024

item.description:

item.title: "利益区》荣获奥斯卡最佳音效奖，塔恩-威勒斯和强尼-伯恩上台领奖，表彰他们为乔纳森-格拉泽影片所做的工作。
item.description:

item.title: "奥本海默》获得奥斯卡最佳电影剪辑奖，演员阿诺德-施瓦辛格和丹尼-德维托为电影剪辑师詹妮弗-拉梅颁奖。
item.description:
"Oppenheimer" won the Oscar for Best Film Editing, with actors Arnold Schwarzenegger and Danny DeVito presenting the award to film editor Jennifer Lame. https://t.co/BUfHNVNISu

— ABC News (@ABC) March 11, 2024

item.title: 贝基-G（Becky G）演唱《火辣辣》（Flamin' Hot）中获得最佳原创歌曲提名的 "The Fire Inside"。

item.title: 马克-鲁法洛（Mark Ruffalo）、拉米-优素福（Ramy Youssef）以及兄妹组合比莉-艾利什（Billie Eilish）和芬尼亚斯-奥康纳尔（Finneas O'Connell）在周日举行的 2024 年奥斯卡颁奖典礼上佩戴红色胸针，以示对以色列-哈马斯战争停火的支持。
item.description:
Mark Ruffalo, Ramy Youssef and brother-sister duo Billie Eilish and Finneas O'Connell wore red pins to show support for a cease-fire in the ongoing Israel-Hamas war at the 2024 Oscars on Sunday.#Oscarshttps://t.co/ksKnJdPWgG pic.twitter.com/qTjx8Zp4Iv

— ABC News (@ABC) March 11, 2024

item.title: 奥斯卡最佳纪录短片奖由 "最后的修理店 "获得。

The Oscar for Best Documentary Short Film went to "The Last Repair Shop." https://t.co/MjLRbOWAwG

— ABC News (@ABC) March 11, 2024

item.title: 在红地毯、鼓舞人心的演讲和当之无愧的奖项之间，2024 年奥斯卡颁奖典礼还发生了许多幕后精彩瞬间。
item.description:
In between the red carpet, inspiring speeches and well-deserved wins, there have been a bounty of exciting behind-the-scenes moments at the 2024 Oscars. https://t.co/Q3HoUQujrg

— ABC News (@ABC) March 11, 2024

item.title: "姆斯蒂斯拉夫-切尔诺夫（Mstyslav Chernov）、米歇尔-米兹纳（Michelle Mizner）和拉尼-阿隆森-拉特（Raney Aronson-Rath）凭借《马里乌波尔的 20 天》获得奥斯卡最佳纪录长片奖。
item.description:
"Probably I will be the first director on this stage who will say I wish I never made this film."

Mstyslav Chernov, Michelle Mizner and Raney Aronson-Rath accept the Oscar for Best Documentary Feature Film for "20 Days in Mariupol."#Oscars#Oscars2024https://t.co/X7unxQW0XY pic.twitter.com/RRuTIn1pYT

— ABC News (@ABC) March 11, 2024

item.title: 乔恩-巴蒂斯特（Jon Batiste）登上奥斯卡颁奖典礼舞台，演唱了《美国交响乐》中的 "It Never Went Away"，这部纪录片讲述了巴蒂斯特和妻子苏莱卡-贾瓦德（Suleika Jaouad）与癌症抗争的感人故事。
item.description:
Jon Batiste took to the Oscars stage to perform "It Never Went Away" from "American Symphony," the moving documentary about Batiste and his wife Suleika Jaouad navigating her cancer battle. https://t.co/sZFu4fxWc0

— ABC News (@ABC) March 11, 2024

item.title: 本-普劳福（Ben Proudfoot）和克里斯-鲍尔斯（Kris Bowers）在 12 岁学生波切-布林克（Porchè Brinker）的帮助下，接受奥斯卡最佳纪录短片奖 "最后的修理店"。
item.description:
Ben Proudfoot and Kris Bowers accept the Oscar for Best Documentary Short Film for “The Last Repair Shop” with the help of 12-year-old student Porchè Brinker.#Oscars#Oscars2024https://t.co/X7unxQW0XY pic.twitter.com/5GbDjKrJJ6

— ABC News (@ABC) March 11, 2024
